entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
